# ino-card
A card is as flexible and extensible content component. 

So far, the card is a simple content component but will be extended for more complex use-cases in future.

### Usage
The component can be used as follows:
```html
<ino-card ino-raised="<boolean>">
  <!-- Any content -->
</ino-button>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### inoRaised

boolean

Styles this card as raised from other contents.


## Attributes

#### ino-raised

boolean

Styles this card as raised from other contents.
